								<input type="text"  name="notes" ng-model="search.notes" aria-label="Notes" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci196033' aria-label="notes" dib-container-name='clientGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='inputText' md-detect-hidden >
								<label>
									Notes
								</label>
								<div ng-messages="clientGrid.notes.$error">
								</div>
							</md-input-container>
						</span>
					</div>
					<div table-column  flex  class="md-subhead" dib-column-heading='196034' style="    " >
						<div class="dib-column-header dib-long-text-column" ng-click="gridOptions.toggleSort('updated')" >
							Updated
							<span ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['updated']">
								({{gridOptions.sortFields['updated']['Count']}}) 
								<md-icon class="md-opacity-55"  md-svg-src="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAngular/src/img/icons/down.svg" ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['updated']['Order'] == 'ASC'">
								</md-icon>
								<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-src="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAngular/src/img/icons/up.svg"  ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['updated']['Order'] == 'DESC'">
								</md-icon>
							</span>
						</div>
						<span ng-if="showSearch" dib-edit>
							<md-input-container aria-label="updated" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=client' >

								<span flex data-type="number" >

									<input type="number"  ng-disabled="true" required name="id" ng-model="model.id" aria-label="Id" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci196023' aria-label="id" dib-container-name='clientGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='inputNumber' md-detect-hidden >

							Close 
						</md-button>

							Clear   
						</md-button>

							Use selected data 
						</md-button>
						<md-button ng-click='addRow($event,row)' class="md-raised  md-accent  "  ng-disabled="!clientGrid.$valid">
							Add   
						</md-button>
					</div>
				</ng-form>
			</md-list-item>
		</md-list>
	</div>
	<md-content  fill-height footer-element='.dib-grid-footer' class='dib-grid-column-content'>
		<md-list dib-table-column-width >
			<md-list-item ng-if="gridData.length == 0"  layout-align="center center">
				<div class="no-records-available">
					  No records available 
				</div>
			</md-list-item>
			<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy " ng-repeat="row in gridData"  ng-class="{ 'md-custom-accent' : row.___selected, 'first-record-padding' : $index==0 && row.___editing }" ng-click="selectRow(row, $event)"   double-click="rowEdit(element)" >
				<ng-form name='clientGrid' dib-container-name="clientGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >
					<div table-column layout="column" flex = 'nogrow' dib-column="195845" style="    " >
						<md-button aria-label="btngridedit" can-be-moved=true flex="nogrow" class="md-icon-button  md-squared md-raised" style="    " id='ci195845' aria-label="btngridedit" dib-container-name='clientGrid' ng-click="common.goTo('clientForm','',true,'?primary_id='+row.id,'',$event);" dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
							<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
								View/edit record in a form
							</md-tooltip>
							<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAdmin/images/ic_mode_edit_black.svg">
							</md-icon>
						</md-button>
					</div>
					<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="196023" style="    " >
						<div aria-label="id" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=client' >
							<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
								<span flex data-type="number" >
									<span>
										{{$parent.viewModel['id']}}
									</span>
								</span>
							</div>

									<input type="number"  ng-disabled="true" required name="id" ng-model="model.id" aria-label="Id" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci196023' aria-label="id" dib-container-name='clientGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='inputNumber' md-detect-hidden >

										Id*
									</label>

						</md-button>
						<md-button ng-click='saveRow($event,row)' class="md-raised  md-accent " ng-disabled="!clientGrid.$valid" >

						</md-button>
					</div>
				</ng-form>
			</md-list-item>
		</md-list>
	</md-content>
	<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
		<div flex=20 layout='row'>
			<md-button disabled>
				Page limit
			</md-button>
			<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
				<md-option ng-value="10">
					10
				</md-option>
				<md-option ng-value="20">
					20
				</md-option>
				<md-option ng-value="50">
					50
				</md-option>
			</md-select>
		</div>
		<div  ng-if="page.count>
			1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
				First 
			</md-button>
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
				Prev 
			</md-button>
			<div layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page
				</md-button>
				<md-input-container>
					<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
				</md-input-container>
				<md-button disabled>
					of {{ page.count }} 
				</md-button>
			</div>
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
				Next 
			</md-button>
			<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
				Last 
			</md-button>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
